A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I don't know how anybody could say this is a great film...I almost walked out after THAT Leia scene...talk about jumping the shark!!! There was so many middle fingers given to the audience and plot holes and bad acting  with no direction. Even the lightsaber fights were bland\, ridiculous and not entertaining...why didn't anybody use a force power? Jump around\, push\, SOMETHING!

And Snoke...don't get me started on Snoke. 

This was not only the worst Star Wars movie I have ever seen\, but the worst movie I've ever seen in general. 

...the Mouse killed Star Wars.
